message.entry: Only one of OutputFormat or WriteFcn can be specified.
This datastore is not backed by files.

Could not get a list of files from the datastore to recalculate the Folders property.\nThe datastore must define either a 'getFiles' method or a 'Files' property to successfully recalculate the Folders property for use in 'writeall'.

The 'Files' property or the 'getFiles' method could not be successfully converted to a cell array of character vectors.\nThe 'getFiles' method or the 'Files' property must return a cell array of character vectors for use in 'writeall'.
The "Folders" property must be specified as a non-empty list of folder names when "FolderLayout" is set to "duplicate".
Either "OutputFormat" or "WriteFcn" must be specified when calling "writeall" on this datastore.
Unrecognized input parameters when using "writeall" with the "WriteFcn" name-value pair:\n\n {0}
The "Folders" property must be a cell array of character vectors.
No "Files" property found. Datastores writing to files must implement the "getFiles" method.
No "Folders" property found. Implement the "getFolders" method to duplicate the folder structure.
Unsupported OutputFormat specified. Query the "SupportedOutputFormats" property of the datastore for acceptable output formats.
Datastore writeall does not support incrementally writing to Parquet files.\nSet ReadSize to ''file''.
The following prefixes are not supported: "\", "/", "|", <, >, "*", ":", "?", ".
The following suffixes are not supported: "\", "/", "|", <, >, "*", ":", "?", ".
UseParallel cannot be used with this datastore since it is not partitionable.
UseParallel cannot be used with CombinedDatastore since it is not partitionable by files.
Filename exceeds length allowed by OS. Reduce length of filename to 255 characters.
WriteFcn must be a function handle.
Unexpected data type. When writing to text or spreadsheet files, the expected data types are ''table'', ''timetable'', ''cell'', and ''matrix''.
The writeall method cannot be issued on an empty datastore.
{0} writeall with "OutputFormat" name-value pair is supported when the output of {0} read is one of the following data types: ''table'', ''timetable'', ''numeric matrix''.
Datastore writeall with UseParallel is not supported on a thread-based parallel pool.\nChoose another parallel environment, for example 'local'.
Unrecognized input parameters when using "writeall":\n\n {0}
The ''FolderLayout'' property must be set to ''flatten'' when the ''Files'' property only consists of http/s URLs.
